attacks.name: Beak Catch
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Spit Shot
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 160 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
